ValidationRule.description: NOKIASC-29142: Only DV&T, System Admin and Data Loader can update Name of Workgroup.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED(Name), $RecordType.Name = "CH_CA_Workgroup", $Profile.Name<>'System Administrator', $Profile.Name<>'Data Loader Profile', NOT($Permission.CARE_DVT_Admin), NOT($Permission.CH_DVTAdminstration)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You don't have permission to update Workgroup Name Field.
